title: Black & Brown Panelled Bomber Jacket
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a unisex bomber jacket with alternating black and dark chocolate brown panels, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, ribbed cuffs and hem, front zipper closure, isolated on plain white background, no model, no mannequin, apparel-only
trims_and_details: ribbed knit collar, cuffs, and hem
techpack: Unisex bomber jacket featuring alternating black and dark brown cotton twill panels, ribbed knit collar/cuffs/hem in charcoal grey, front metal zipper closure, polyester blend lining, two side welt pockets. Hip length, relaxed fit, long sleeves.
provenance: Designed by combining trending black and brown color palette for commercial-ready outerwear.
design_text:
Black & Brown Panelled Bomber Jacket (BBJ-001)
Colors: black, dark brown, charcoal grey
Fabrics: cotton twill, polyester blend lining, ribbed knit trim
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: jacket
Silhouette: relaxed bomber
Sleeves: long sleeves with ribbed cuffs
Neckline: crew neckline with ribbed collar
Length: hip length
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: front metal zipper, ribbed knit collar, cuffs, and hem, panelled body with alternating colors, two side welt pockets
Techpack: available
